str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: From kata and argeo; to be entirely idle, literally or figuratively.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.
